title: League of Legends bug, Low Ping and fine fps but keep disconnecting
body: My ping and fps are fine, my ping is around 40-60 ms and my fps is around 120, the game keeps disconnecting even though I have fine ping and FPS the game will just freeze and a popup will go saying "attempting to reconnect"

replies.body: I'm in East Coast and I got this problem after the new patch update. Before that league was running very smoothly.

There has been some issues affecting the West Coast, primarily with Comcast, causing some issues with ping and disconnects.  However, it doesn't appear that this is directly impacting you at all.  Because of this, if this issue is still consistently occurring game to game, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664).  It has some of the most common solutions that should resolve these in-game connection issues.

Give me a heads up if you are still experiencing issues!
I followed everything in the link, the fps and ping are fine but i keep getting stturing and disconnecting, it only happens with league of legends all the other games i can connect fine
Same issues on the east coast for me right now.  Very annoying 40ms spikes to 400+  game freezing and catching up.  Unplayable

So this has been happening a lot lately, and I figured it's about time to say something. For like, the last 4 days randomly league would freeze or lag. My ping would be fine and so would my FPS but occasionally my champ will just stand there for a good 5-10 seconds and do nothing. After, it'll unfreeze and I'd either be dead and everything suddenly speeds up... For example, minions are still attacking but their health doesn't move, and when I'm done lagging/freezing then it zooms down speedy quick and the minions are suddenly low.

Reminder, it's not ping lag spikes when this happens, my FPS and Ping couldn't be better whenever this happens. It'll happen when I have 80 ping and like 52 FPS.

I dont know what's going on but it's making it entirely frustrating to play, rito pls ):

PS. Occasionally I have been getting randomly high ping too, but it's not as much of as issue as this. Common, but not as common as the issue I'm asking about. At least with ping lag spikes I know it's ping lag spikes, I don't know whats going on here???

Yeah I just lost a game because we were in the load screen then got kicked off so I assumed it was the "maintenance' issue that the warning had mentioned. I log in again and next thing I know it's asking me to reconnect to the game. i do that see the loading screen now it's a 3v3. Of course, all the other team's members eventually come back and we lose the game because our top laner never connected . it seems like players got dc'ed before the load screen but then eventually came back

Hasn't been happening to me but alot of people in my games have been disconnecting on my team and the enemies team

Glad East coast got that stable connection
This keeps happening to me aswell. Kinda salt just lost a ranked game because of this
You might just have to restart you computer or your internet. It has happen to me a couple times and fixed it by restarting everything.
